vega.uplink.pointing.PtrParameters

Class Target

  • java.lang.Object
    • CompositeDataset
      • vega.uplink.pointing.PointingMetadata
        • vega.uplink.pointing.PtrParameters.Target

  • public class Target
extends PointingMetadata
    Fixed vector defined relative to inertial frame, solar system object or landmarks defined in the PDFM
